languages.text: {n}В голове раздается скребущийся {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}смешок{/d}.{/n} "Приказ Императора? Этот старик принес в жертву своих послушников, чтобы гадать на их плоти, крови и костях. Он тщится узреть откровения трупа на троне посреди сплетения случайностей. Он так желает откровений, что... выдумывает их себе".

{n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."
languages.original_text: {n}В голове раздается скребущийся {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}смешок{/d}.{/n} "Приказ Императора? Этот старик принес в жертву своих послушников, чтобы гадать на их плоти, крови и костях. Он тщится узреть откровения трупа на троне посреди сплетения случайностей. Он так желает откровений, что... выдумывает их себе".

languages.text: {n}Oyes una {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}risa{/d} que araña el interior de tu cabeza.{/n} «¿Que se lo ordenó el Emperador? Este viejo necio sacrificó a sus discípulos para leer su carne, su sangre y sus huesos. Quiere ver las revelaciones del emperador cadáver en una maraña de casualidades. Está tan desesperado que... inventa sus propios augurios».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes una risa que araña el interior de tu cabeza.{/n} «¿Que se lo ordenó el Emperador? Este viejo necio sacrificó a sus discípulos para leer su carne, su sangre y sus huesos. Quiere ver las revelaciones del emperador cadáver en una maraña de casualidades. Está tan desesperado que... inventa sus propios augurios».

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}笑い声{/d}が頭の内側をかすめる。{/n}「皇帝が命じた？この愚かな老人は、信者たちの肉と血と骨を読むために彼らを犠牲にしたのだ。偶然のもつれの中で、死体の皇帝の啓示を見る気なのだ。自暴自棄になり…自分のためにお告げを考え出した」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}笑い声が頭の内側をかすめる。{/n}「皇帝が命じた？この愚かな老人は、信者たちの肉と血と骨を読むために彼らを犠牲にしたのだ。偶然のもつれの中で、死体の皇帝の啓示を見る気なのだ。自暴自棄になり…自分のためにお告げを考え出した」

languages.text: {n}你听到脑海中传来了{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}哄堂大笑{/d}。{/n}“是帝皇吩咐他这么做的？这个老白痴，他牺牲了他那些学徒，用他们的血肉和骨头占卜未来。他想证明这一系列巧合都出于尸皇的启示，他不顾一切……甚至自己编造出了那些预兆。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到脑海中传来了哄堂大笑。{/n}“是帝皇吩咐他这么做的？这个老白痴，他牺牲了他那些学徒，用他们的血肉和骨头占卜未来。他想证明这一系列巧合都出于尸皇的启示，他不顾一切……甚至自己编造出了那些预兆。”

languages.text: {n}Du hörst, wie {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Lachen{/d} an der Innenseite deines Kopfes kratzt.{/n} "Der Imperator hat es ihm aufgetragen? Dieser alte Narr hat seine Jünger geopfert, um ihr Fleisch, ihr Blut und ihre Knochen zu lesen. Er will die Offenbarungen des Leichenimperators im Gewirr des Zufalls sehen. Er ist so verzweifelt, dass er ... Omen erfindet."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."

Er ist so verzweifelt, dass er ... Omen erfindet."

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}rire{/d} grincer dans votre tête.{/n} « Un ordre de l'Empereur ? Ce vieux fou a sacrifié ses disciples pour lire dans leurs chairs, leur sang et leurs os. Il cherche désespérément à voir dans l'écheveau du hasard les révélations de l'Empereur-Cadavre, au point de s'inventer tout seul des présages. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}laughter{/d} scraping against the inside of your head.{/n} "The Emperor bid him? This old fool sacrificed his disciples to read their flesh, blood, and bones. He wants to see the corpse emperor's revelations in the tangle of happenstance. He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."

languages.text: {n}Beyninin içinde gıcırdayan bir {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}kahkaha{/d} duyuyorsun.{/n} "İmparator ona böyle mi emretmiş? Bu ihtiyar ahmak; sırf etlerinden, kanlarından ve kemiklerinden okuma yapabilsin diye müritlerini kurban etmiş. İç içe geçen tesadüfler karmaşasında ceset imparatorun kehanetlerini görmek istiyor. O kadar biçare ki... Kafasından alametler uyduruyor."

He is so desperate that he... invents omens for himself."
